alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:18PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bertie, Northampton and western Hertford Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 817 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Rich Square, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rich Square and Roxobel around 855 PM EDT. Woodland around 905 PM EDT. Aulander around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Mapleton, Jackson, Burden, Union and Bryantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
